business.headline: Aviation stocks tumble after Air India plane crash in AhmedabadSpiceJet's share price dropped 3.42% at the start of the trading session. InterGlobe Aviation Ltd, the company that runs IndiGo, also fell 4.83%, slipping to Rs 5,212 in early trade.
Sensex, Nifty crash as Israel attacks Iran; oil prices jump sharplyThe S&P BSE Sensex tanked 838.78 points to 80,853.20, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 252.80 points to 24,635.40 as of 9:25 am.

Sensex falls over 1,100 points. Why is the stock market falling today?The BSE Sensex was down 1121.35 points to 80,570.63 at 9:16 am, while the NSE Nifty50 tumbled 334.65 points to trade at 24,553.55.

Stock market opening: Will Sensex, Nifty crash today over Israel-Iran conflict?The situation in the Middle East has affected global investor sentiment. Oil prices also jumped on fears that the strikes could affect supply from the region, which is known for producing large amounts of oil.

Stocks to watch on June 13: Tata Group, RIL, HCL, Asian Paints, ICRA, ICICI BankShares of several Tata Group companies, such as Tata Motors, Tata Steel and Tata Chemicals, are expected to remain in the spotlight after the crash of Air India flight AI171 in Ahmedabad shortly after takeoff.

Boeing shares slide 5% after Air India Dreamliner crash kills over 200Flight AI171, bound for London, went down minutes after departure, killing more than 200 people in what is now the world's deadliest aviation disaster in a decade. The cause of the crash remains unclear.

Tata Group to give Rs 1 crore to families of Ahmedabad Air India crash victimsTata Group will offer Rs 1 crore to family members of people who lost their lives in the Ahmedabad crash of Air India Flight 171, which killed over 200 people on Thursday.

This is a difficult day for us: Air India CEO reacts to Ahmedabad plane crashAt least 204 people were killed and 41 injured after the London-bound Air India flight crashed just minutes after taking off from Ahmedabad's Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport on Thursday.

Retail inflation hits six-year low, falls to 2.82% in May 2025The decline in retail inflation is mainly because food prices rose at a much slower pace than before. Cheaper vegetables, fruits, cereals, and pulses helped bring food inflation down sharply. In May, food inflation fell to 0.99% from 1.78% in April.

Sensex tanks 823 points, Nifty falls below 25,000; Tata Motors falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 823.16 points to close at 81,691.98, while the NSE Nifty50 fell by 253.20 points to settle at 24,888.20.

Boeing reacts to Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, says aware of initial reportsThe London-bound flight AI-171, carrying 242 people including 230 passengers and 12 crew members, crashed in the Meghaninagar area near the Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport minutes after takeoff. The plane had issued a mayday call before losing contact with air traffic control.

Shocked and deeply saddened: Gautam Adani after Air India plane crash in AhmedabadOn Thursday afternoon, an Air India flight heading to London crashed just minutes after take-off, with 242 people on board. The flight, AI-171, was being operated by a Boeing 787 Dreamliner.

entertainment.headline: Housefull 5 box office Day 7: Akshay Kumar's film slows down after one week run'Housefull 5', Akshay Kumar's comedy entertainer, witnessed a drop in its day-wise collection on Day 7. The film released in theatres on June 6.

Pankaj Tripathi shoots in minimal clothing, says it's not for sensationalismPankaj Tripathi stepped out of his comfort zone in 'Metro… In Dino' by shooting a bold scene in public with minimal clothing. He called it a necessary part of the story and not just done for attention.

Thug Life box office Day 8: No growth for Kamal Haasan's film, eyes Rs 45 croreKamal Haasan and director Mani Ratnam's 'Thug Life' has been earning around Rs 1 crore in India during the weekdays. It is inching closer to Rs 45 crore nett at the domestic box office, which is low for a film with big names.

Dhanush, Rashmika's Kuberaa pre-release event postponed after Air India plane crashThe makers of 'Kuberaa' have postponed the film's pre-release event following the tragic Ahmedabad plane crash. This move is to honour the victims and show solidarity during this difficult time.

Badshah becomes first Punjabi rapper to attend Paris Men's Fashion Week 2025Indian rapper Badshah is set to make his debut at Paris Men's Fashion Week 2025. He became the first Punjabi rapper to attend as a celebrity guest.

Shah Rukh Khan turns up at his stylish best at personal trainer's wedding. VideoShah Rukh Khan attended his personal trainer Prashant Sawant's wedding in Mumbai on Thursday. He was accompanied by his manager, Pooja Dadlani.

Vikrant Massey clarifies Air India flight co-pilot Clive Kunder wasn't his cousinActor Vikrant Massey has addressed rumours about losing his cousin in the recent Air India crash. He confirmed that the victim, Clive Kunder, was a close family friend, not a relative.

Kareena and Saif rush to Karisma Kapoor's house after Sunjay Kapur's deathKareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan rushed to Karisma Kapoor's house after her ex-husband Sunjay Kapur's death. Sunjay died of a heart attack while playing polo.
Eric Dane opens up about ALS diagnosis: I don't think this is end of my storyEric Dane opens up about his ALS diagnosis in an emotional GMA interview, sharing strength, hope, and resilience.

Mel Brooks to Return as Yogurt in Long-Awaited 'Spaceballs' SequelMel Brooks will reprise his role as Yogurt in a new Spaceballs sequel from Amazon MGM, set for 2027. The cult comedy legend returns to acting just ahead of his 99th birthday.

Who is Callum Turner? Dua Lipa's fiancé and award-nominated actorCallum Turner, now engaged to Dua Lipa, has steadily built a celebrated career with acclaimed roles and major nominations, transitioning from modeling to acting and earning a $5 million net worth.
Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband Sunjay Kapur dies of heart attack at 53 Actor Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband, Sanjay Kapur, died of a heart attack in England. He was 53.

Dua Lipa, Callum Turner are engaged, singer reflects on growing old with actorSinger Dua Lipa confirmed her engagement to British actor Callum Turner. She also opened up on her future plans with Turner, while reflecting on their bond.

Siddhant Chaturvedi's romance with K-drama star Chae Soo-bin in new ad charms fansSiddhant Chaturvedi teamed up with K-drama star Chae Soo-bin for a new ad that captured a romantic moment between the two - and it's gone viral. Fans love the dreamy vibe, calling it a perfect blend of K-drama aesthetics and Mumbai monsoon romance.

Aamir Khan rejected Swades, never watched SRK's film. Here's whyActor Aamir Khan shared that he is yet to watch Shah Rukh Khan starrer 'Swades'. He said the film was initially offered to him, but he found it very boring.

Rota rota ghar gaya: Bigg Boss 17's Abhishek Kumar recalls casting couch incidentActor Abhishek Kumar opened up about a distressing casting couch experience in Mumbai. The actor said that the incident left him traumatised and made him reconsider his career in the entertainment industry.

Aamir Khan defends endorsing sports betting app: If it is legal, let me do itActor Aamir Khan opened up on his decision to endorse a sports betting app while refraining from alcohol and tobacco advertisements. The actor highlighted his consideration for quality and creative scripts while saying yes to brands.

SRK heartbroken after Ahmedabad plane crash, sends prayers for victims' familiesActor Shah Rukh Khan shared a note on X, expressing deep grief for the victims of the Ahmedabad plane crash. The actor also sent prayers for the families of those affected.

Bobby Deol shares rare pic of Dharmendra and Prakash Kaur on their 71st anniversaryActor Bobby Deol shared a rare picture of his parents, actor Dharmendra and his first wife, Prakash Kaur, on social media. His post marked the 71st wedding anniversary celebration of his parents.

general news.headline: Live: PM holds meeting at Ahmedabad airport after visiting crash site, hospitalAir India Ahmedabad-London Flight Crash Live: At least 265 people have died in the Air India plane crash that took place in Ahmedabad on Thursday. Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to visit Ahmedabad to take stock of the situation. The airline, in a post on X, confirmed that only one of the 242 passengers and crew onboard had miraculously survived the crash. Rescue operations at the site have now been completed. The flight bound for London crashed near Ahmedabad airport during take-off. The crash occurred as the aircraft was lifting off, according to early reports. Emergency services are at the scene. Stay with IndiaToday.in for live updates.

265 dead in Air India crash, 1 survivor; forensics team at accident siteAir India Flight AI171 bound for London crashed moments after taking off from Ahmedabad airport, killing at least 265 people in what authorities described as the world's worst aviation disaster in a decade.

Air India crash: What may have gone wrong? A commercial pilot's first analysisVisual evidence shows that as the Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner departed, its landing gear remained extended and its wing flaps were fully retracted.

Israel hits Iran's nuke sites without US support, Tehran vows retaliation  Live UpdatesIsrael on Friday launched preemptive strikes on Iran, which the nation called Operation Rising Lion, and said was necessary to wade off the nuclear threat from Tehran's side. Meanwhile, Iran has vowed retaliation and after the strikes killed several, including Iran's Revolutionary Guards Commander Hossein Salami.

Video explainer: How ill-fated Air India AI-171 crashedAn Air India plane with 242 people on board crashed near Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport shortly after taking-off on Thursday in Ahmedabad.

At least 16 Air India flights diverted due to Iran airspace closure after Israel strikeSeveral Air India flights were diverted or forced to return to their origin airports after Iran closed its airspace following a major Israeli strike on Tehran.

Video: Man on seat 11A miraculously walks out after deadly Air India crashOne passenger survived the Air India plane crash after jumping off the flight. The crash killed 204 people in Ahmedabad today.

Iran's Revolutionary Guards chief Hossein Salami killed in Israeli strike: ReportsIranian state media on Friday confirmed the killing of Iran's Revolutionary Guards Commander Hossein Salami in an Israeli strike.
Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband Sunjay Kapur dies of heart attack at 53 Actor Karisma Kapoor's ex-husband, Sanjay Kapur, died of a heart attack in England. He was 53.

Sensex falls over 1,100 points. Why is the stock market falling today?The BSE Sensex was down 1121.35 points to 80,570.63 at 9:16 am, while the NSE Nifty50 tumbled 334.65 points to trade at 24,553.55.

Rajasthan couple headed to London with kids among Air India plane crash victimsThe family was traveling together when the ill-fated aircraft, operating as flight AI171, crashed into a medical college complex in Ahmedabad's Meghaninagar area and erupted into flames.

No immediate reason to ground Boeing 787: US officials after Air India crashAfter a deadly Air India crash killed over 240 people, US officials said there's no current reason to ground Boeing 787 jets. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy confirmed that FAA and NTSB teams are working with Indian authorities and Boeing to investigate. "We will follow the facts and put safety first," Duffy said.

Newlywed on way to meet husband in UK among victims of Gujarat air crashKhushboo and Vipul married in January this year. While Vipul had left for UK shortly after the wedding, Khushboo was on her way to join him when the flight she was travelling on crashed in Ahmedabad.

US probe body to help Air India crash investigation, team to visit IndiaAt least 242 people-230 passengers and 12 crew members, were on board the AI-171 flight which crashed within a minute of taking off from Ahmedabad airport.

Vikrant Massey clarifies Air India flight co-pilot Clive Kunder wasn't his cousinActor Vikrant Massey has addressed rumours about losing his cousin in the recent Air India crash. He confirmed that the victim, Clive Kunder, was a close family friend, not a relative.

No chance to save, 1.25 lakh litre fuel burned: Amit Shah on plane crashOn Thursday, flight AI-171 crashed on a government hospital hostel near Ahemdabad's Sardar Vallabbhai Patel International Airport, leaving a field of debris and scenes of devastation.

Dua Lipa, Callum Turner are engaged, singer reflects on growing old with actorSinger Dua Lipa confirmed her engagement to British actor Callum Turner. She also opened up on her future plans with Turner, while reflecting on their bond.

Raj mastermind, aides killed as favour: New details in Raja Raghuvanshi's murder caseAccording to Shillong Superintendent of Police Vivek Syiem, the murder was planned 11 days before Sonam's wedding to Raja.

WTC final on a knife's edge as Australia, South Africa trade blows on Day 2WTC 2025 final, SA vs AUS: Alex Carey chipped in with a crucial 43 to rescue Australia from 73 for 7 and help them finish with 144 for 8 at Stumps on Day 2. 28 wickets have fallen in the first two days of the big final at Lord's and Australia have their noses ahead, only by a small margin.

Vijay Rupani: How the Rangoon-born came to lead GujaratFormer Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani died in the Air India crash in Ahmedabad on Thursday, just five minutes after take-off. Born in Myanmar and raised in Rajkot, Rupani rose from a student activist to Gujarat's 16th CM, with deep roots in the BJP and strong ties to PM Narendra Modi.
Eric Dane opens up about ALS diagnosis: I don't think this is end of my storyEric Dane opens up about his ALS diagnosis in an emotional GMA interview, sharing strength, hope, and resilience.

Anything we can do to help: Donald Trump after Air India plane crashUS President Donald Trump has offered his support following the Ahmedabad plane crash in which more than 200 people lost their lives. The Boeing 787-8 Dreamliner aircraft crashed five minutes after taking-off near Ahmedabad airport.

27-year-old flight attendant from Maharashtra among victims of Air India plane crashRoshni Songhare was onboard Air India flight AI171, which was headed to London but crashed shortly after takeoff from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport in Ahmedabad.

Meghalaya is safe: Tourists back state's reputation after Raja Raghuvanshi's murderThe incident, though shocking, has not dampened the spirits of travelers, many of whom continue to explore the state and interact positively with the local community.

sports.headline: Diya Chitale: The tiny titan of Indian table tennis dreamsDabang Delhi's Diya Chitale believes that India have a proper shot at a table tennis medal at the LA Olympics. India Today spoke to her on the sidelines of Ultimate Table Tennis where she opened up on her journey and the growing Indian TT scene.

Happy to get a lead of 200, hopefully we get another 20 or 30 tomorrow: Pat CumminsAustralia captain Pat Cummins said that he was delighted with his team crossing the 200-run lead in the second innings of the World Test Championship (WTC) final against South Africa. Australia finished Day 2 at 144/8, leading by 218 runs at the end of the day's play.

India vs India A in 4-day intra-squad game in Beckenham: Will it be streamed live?India will finalise their preparation for the all-important five-match Test series against England, through a 4-day intra-squad warm-up fixture against India A. However, the match will not be live-streamed for fans.

Did Australia withdraw appeal against David Bedingham in WTC final? Cummins revealsAustralia captain Pat Cummins said that they would've withdrawn the appeal against David Bedingham for handling the ball, if the umpires didn't signal dead ball on Day 2 of the World Test Championship (WTC) final 2025 against South Africa.

From IPL 2025 to T20 Mumbai: Shreyas Iyer endures back-to-back final heartbreaksT20 Mumbai League 2025: Shreyas Iyer endured a second heartbreak in June as his side, SoBo Mumbai Falcons, lost the final of the inaugural edition of the T20 tournament in Mumbai. On June 3, Shreyas's Punjab Kings lost to RCB in the IPL final.

UTT Season 6: U Mumba qualify for semifinals, end Dabang Delhi's unbeaten streakU Mumba TT clinched the last available semi-final berth in Ultimate Table Tennis (UTT) Season 6 after defeating Dabang Delhi TTC 10-5 in a crucial match held in Ahmedabad on Thursday.

South Africa well-placed in WTC final: Ngidi confident despite 218-run deficitLungi Ngidi was confident that South Africa's bowlers could finish the job early on the third day, removing the final two Australian wickets and keeping the target below 230—a total he believes would give the Proteas a genuine chance of winning their first World Test Championship title.

WTC final on a knife's edge as Australia, South Africa trade blows on Day 2WTC 2025 final, SA vs AUS: Alex Carey chipped in with a crucial 43 to rescue Australia from 73 for 7 and help them finish with 144 for 8 at Stumps on Day 2. 28 wickets have fallen in the first two days of the big final at Lord's and Australia have their noses ahead, only by a small margin.

Players observe silence in Mumbai T20 final to mourn Air India plane crash victimsMumbai T20 League 2025 final: Players from both the SoBo Mumbai Falcons and the Mumbai South Central Maratha Royals observed a one-minute silence to mourn the victims of the tragic Air India plane crash.

Kevin De Bruyne joins Napoli on free transfer after leaving Manchester CitySerie A champions Napoli have confirmed the signing of Kevin De Bruyne on a free transfer following his exit from Manchester City at the end of his contract.

Pakistan in talks with Afghanistan for tri-series if Asia Cup is postponedThe Pakistan Cricket Board is negotiating a tri-series with Afghanistan and UAE amid doubts over the Asia Cup in India. India have the hosting rights for the continental tournament, scheduled to be held later this year.

South Africa well-placed in WTC final: Ngidi confident despite 218-run deficitLungi Ngidi was confident that South Africa's bowlers could finish the job early on the third day, removing the final two Australian wickets and keeping the target below 230—a total he believes would give the Proteas a genuine chance of winning their first World Test Championship title.

WTC final on a knife's edge as Australia, South Africa trade blows on Day 2WTC 2025 final, SA vs AUS: Alex Carey chipped in with a crucial 43 to rescue Australia from 73 for 7 and help them finish with 144 for 8 at Stumps on Day 2. 28 wickets have fallen in the first two days of the big final at Lord's and Australia have their noses ahead, only by a small margin.

Players observe silence in Mumbai T20 final to mourn Air India plane crash victimsMumbai T20 League 2025 final: Players from both the SoBo Mumbai Falcons and the Mumbai South Central Maratha Royals observed a one-minute silence to mourn the victims of the tragic Air India plane crash.

Kevin De Bruyne joins Napoli on free transfer after leaving Manchester CitySerie A champions Napoli have confirmed the signing of Kevin De Bruyne on a free transfer following his exit from Manchester City at the end of his contract.

Pakistan in talks with Afghanistan for tri-series if Asia Cup is postponedThe Pakistan Cricket Board is negotiating a tri-series with Afghanistan and UAE amid doubts over the Asia Cup in India. India have the hosting rights for the continental tournament, scheduled to be held later this year.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
